Posts.Content: Jul 17, 2012 09:23PM Ericashoe wrote: Your BC sounds very similar to mine, however my oncotype score was 18. I met with my onc yesterday and was given the choice of Tamoxifen and TC chemo x4 or Tamoxifen and ovarian supression. I am finding this to be a VERY difficult decision. I am also young (30) with no children yet. I am wondering what treatment regimen you chose, and how is that going for you?
Posts.Title: CHEMO OR HORMONE THERAPY HELP! sj29 Ericashoe
